data.title: Give
data.meta_description: Join us in our efforts to outsmart cancer. Learn about the many ways you can get involved and donate to MSKCC, and fund life saving cancer research today.
data.text:
All Ways to Give

Donations allow MSK to continue making breakthroughs in cancer research, care, and education. Take a look at all the ways you can make an impact.

One-time donation

Make a tax-deductible gift simply and securely.

Get started

Monthly gifts

Join the Friends of MSK and set up monthly donations.

Sign up

Show your love for people and causes

For many, donating is personal. Whatever your motivation, we have many ways to help you make an impact.

Contribute in honor or memory

You can make several types of contributions in a loved one’s honor or memory. It’s a meaningful way to pay tribute to someone special as well as to donate to cancer research, providing more hope and optimism for the next generation.

Honor a loved one

local_florist

Request donations in lieu of flowers

We have language to help you request donations in your loved one’s obituary or memorial information.

laptop

Donate to a fundraiser

Thousands of MSK supporters have set up fundraising pages — from crowdfunding to birthday celebrations.

event_note

Support an event

There’s a wide range of events, like donation-based yoga classes and bake sales, that you can contribute to.

bookmark

Give by cancer type

You can designate your donation for a certain type of cancer to accelerate research that can lead to new treatment options and cures.

Maximize your giving

There’s power in numbers. Many life events give you the opportunity to engage your friends and family. Your employer can also help increase your contribution.

Matching gifts

One of the easiest ways to double your gift is to take advantage of company-matched gifts. See if your employer participates — and if it’s a yes, all you have to do is submit a form. We’ll work with your company to make sure the transfer takes place.

Get the details

celebration

Turn party favors into contributions

Rethink party favors and make donations on your guests’ behalf. Use our form to customize your announcement.

card_giftcard

Ask for donations instead of gifts

Celebrating something special? Think about asking for contributions to MSK rather than gifts.

Create a legacy of generosity

Legacy giving, also known as planned giving, allows donors to plan gifts years before they’re shared. If you’re helping a client, take a look at our guide on giving for professional advisors.

Estate planning

Make an impact that lasts beyond your years by including MSK in your plans. Bequest gifts are made through your will or living trust, giving you the opportunity to leave a legacy you can be proud of.

Get the details on bequests and wills

diversity_1

Life income gifts

Donate to MSK and provide an income for you or your family for a designated period of time.

compare_arrows

Donor-advised funds

Recommend a grant through your donor-advised fund to maximize your impact.

show_chart

IRA-qualified charitable contributions

If you are 70 1/2 or older, you can make a tax-free gift to MSK from your IRA.

real_estate_agent

Real estate

There are numerous ways to make a gift of real estate — and just as many advantages.

One partnership. Many possibilities.

Corporations and foundations are key partners in MSK’s mission of ending cancer for life. However you get involved, our team will help you find initiatives to meet your organization’s goals.

Make giving part of your business

Let’s work together to create an integrated, multichannel philanthropic program that suits your company or brand. Join MSK in making an impact on cancer research and care that is felt worldwide.

Email our team

groups

Contribute as a foundation

Whatever your foundation’s areas of focus, our team is here to match you with an MSK initiative that will help you achieve your goals. Email our team to inquire about foundation giving.

work

Employee engagement and workplace giving

Unite your employees help them feel even more connected to their jobs — and your company. Host an event, launch a fundraising challenge, or motivate donors through a match.

Need more information? Let’s connect.

Contact us
